senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>прицеливаться</w>.

examples.text: Охотник, долго <w>прицеливавшийся</w> в летящую утку, наконец нажал на курок.

target_lang_translations.en: The hunter, who had been <w>aiming</w> at the flying duck for a long time, finally pulled the trigger.

examples.text: Спортсмен, тщательно <w>прицеливавшийся</w> перед броском, выглядел очень сосредоточенным.

target_lang_translations.en: The athlete, carefully <w>aiming</w> before the throw, looked very focused.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb 'to aim' or 'to take aim', describing someone or something that was directing a weapon, object, or attention towards a target.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: participle form indicating the action of directing something at a target
phrase indicating the process of aligning a weapon or object
relative clause translation often used for past active participles
